ComicInfo.Title: The Wax Men; The Body Snatchers; Juggernaut; Tennis Anyone?; The Last Man
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Wax Men: A man has dinner every night with wax figures around the table and refers to them as his family. A woman schemes to marry him for his money even though she believes him to be insane, but she finds out that they really are his family, as he is made of wax too.
The Body Snatchers: Corpses rise to take revenge upon a doctor who deals with ghouls in order to procure bodies for his medical school.
Juggernaut: A priest convinces followers to sacrifice themselves under the wheels of a heavy cart so that he can steal their belongings. In the night the cart chases the priest up a hill and he sees that it is being pushed by the ghosts of the sacrificed men.
Tennis Anyone?: A tennis player with poor form beats an expert with a racket consisting of strings of human intestine.
The Last Man: A bank robber shoots a clerk, and when he is slugged in the head by a police officer, he finds himself lost in a guilt induced fantasy where aliens have kidnapped all of Earth's population except for him and the clerk and the clerk dies in his arms from the bullet wound.
